SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.utils

Class PlacesCompleteAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
com.example.eventlottery.utils.PlacesCompleteAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class PlacesCompleteAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String> implements android.widget.Filterable
PlacesCompleteAdapter is a custom adapter that provides autocomplete suggestions for places. It connects to the Google Places API to fetch predictions based on the user's input text and displays them in a dropdown list.

  • Method Details

    • getPlaceId

      public String getPlaceId(int position)
      Retrieves the unique Place ID for the item at the specified position. This ID can be used to fetch more details about the selected place.
      Parameters:
      position - The index of the item in the list.
      Returns:
      The Place ID string, or null if the position is invalid.

    • getCount

      public int getCount()
      Returns the total number of suggestion results currently stored in the adapter.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Returns:

    • getItem

      public String getItem(int position)
      Returns the suggestion text (address or place name) at the specified position.
      Specified by:
      getItem in interface android.widget.Adapter
      Overrides:
      getItem in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
      Parameters:
      position - The index of the item.
      Returns:
      The full text description of the place.

    • getFilter

      @NonNull public android.widget.Filter getFilter()
      Returns a filter that performs the actual search query to the Google Places API. It runs asynchronously to fetch predictions as the user types.
      Specified by:
      getFilter in interface android.widget.Filterable
      Overrides:
      getFilter in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
      Returns:
      A Filter object that handles the API request and result publishing.
